_description: Contrast of the sorrow when rejected by Christ with the joy when accepted, translating a Latin couplet — one cross-rhymed quatrain in a Latin sermon

BodLatTheD1.Transcription:
As mekyll as þer schal be hewynesqwan crist schal sey so ȝe
                    me frooSo mekyll schal þer be gladnesqwan he xal say can ȝe
                    me too
